meta.title: Ritual for Guiding/Helping the Dead (e.g. into a Pure Land)

nodes.title: Ritual for Guiding/Helping the Dead (e.g. into a Pure Land)
Related Terms
nodes.body:
• gshin po’am tshe ‘das rjes su ‘dzin pa’i cho ga; 
  • gshin sbyang; 
  • sbyang chog; 
  • gshin po rnams kyi rnam shes gnas spor byed pa'i cho ga; 
  • gshin chog; 
  • gshin chos; 
  • gnas chog, 
  • gnas ‘dren, 
  • gnas dgongs, 
  • gnas lung

nodes.title: Example Texts
nodes.body:
• Mi ‘khrugs pa’i sgo nas gshin po rjes gzung gi cho ga
  • Lho sgo’i cho ga

nodes.title: Secondary Sources
nodes.body:
Mumford, Stan Royal. "The Pai Rite: Underworld Exchange and Sending the Bird" and "Guiding the Soul to the Land of the Dead." In Himalayan Dialogue: Tibetan Lamas and Gurung Shamans in Nepal, 182-191. Madison: University of Wisconsin Press, 1989.

Mumford, Stan Royal. "Guiding the Consciousness in the Bardo." In Himalayan Dialogue: Tibetan Lamas and Gurung Shamans in Nepal, 209-214. Madison: University of Wisconsin Press, 1989.
